repairedDockerfile:
FROM openjdk:8u131-jre

ENV DOCKERIZE_VERSION v0.2.0

RUN wget --no-check-certificate https://github.com/jwilder/dockerize/releases/download/$DOCKERIZE_VERSION/dockerize-linux-amd64-$DOCKERIZE_VERSION.tar.gz \
    && tar -C /usr/local/bin -xzvf dockerize-linux-amd64-$DOCKERIZE_VERSION.tar.gz \
    && apt-get update \
    && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y procps \
    && sed -i 's/assistive_technologies=org.GNOME.Accessibility.AtkWrapper//' /etc/java-8-openjdk/accessibility.properties && rm dockerize-linux-amd64-$DOCKERIZE_VERSION.tar.gz && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

EXPOSE 3828

ADD build/docker/atlasdb-ete-snapshot.tgz /atlasdb-ete

# Remove possible version prefix
RUN for file in atlasdb-ete/*; do mv "$file" "atlasdb-ete/atlasdb-ete-snapshot"; done

ADD docker/conf/ /atlasdb-ete/atlasdb-ete-snapshot/var/conf

WORKDIR /atlasdb-ete/atlasdb-ete-snapshot

CMD service/bin/init.sh console
